original_text: A farmer ploughs the ground because he wants to plant seeds in it. He does not continue to plough for ever. A farmer ploughs the ground because he wants to plant seeds in it. He does not continue to plough for ever.
korean_text: 파종하려고 가는 자가 어찌 쉬지 않고 갈기만 하겠느냐 자기 땅을 개간하며 고르게만 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: because he wants to plant seeds in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것에 씨를 심고 싶어하기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: He does not continue to plough for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 영원히 계속해서 밭을 갈지 않는다
